name: Book of Arakoven
description:
Welcome to Arakoven - an open world where every choice matters. Discover the secrets hiding in this seemingly docile village by interacting with all of the inhabitants. Make your choices carefully

Arrows / WASD to move

Right click to speak to Characters

Left click to attack

Hold C to crouch

Press Q to toggle the pause / quest menu

Press Escape to toggle the control screen 

Press space bar to jump

Credits:

Design: Dean Thomas

Story and Quests: Kyle Arias

Programming: Jason Marciniak, Dean Thomas, and Michael Albright

2D Art and Textures: Sarina Vail

Music and Sounds: Amonnie Nicolas

3D Art: Eric Campos

White Speech Bubble and Exclamation icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
